artist: Painter: After Adriaen van de Velde; Lithographer: Gustav Wolff
description: winter scene with men sleighing and playing on a frozen canal; men standing on bank at left; city walls far right
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Gemalt von Adrien van der Velde   Lithogr von G. Wolfe in Dresden / HOLLANDISCHE WINTERLANDSCHAFT / (Dresdiner Galerie) / 60 | on sheet in pencil: 2-536
title: Hollandische Winterlandschaft
